Container.Name: testerfy
Container.Overview:
Testerfy — Spotify Playlist Curation Made Easy
Burn through discovery playlists at speed. Like saves to your target playlists and skips, dislike removes and skips. Every decision is logged with timestamps, decision speed, and listening stats.
Features: one-tap like/dislike with auto-skip, playlist guard, passive listening tracker, decision time analytics, undo support, mobile-friendly UI, encrypted tokens (AES-256-GCM).
SETUP (5 min): 1. Install Tailscale plugin (required for HTTPS) 2. Run: tailscale serve --bg --https 5247 http://localhost:5247 3. Create a Spotify Developer App at developer.spotify.com/dashboard 4. Set redirect URI to https://MACHINE.TAILNET.ts.net:5247/api/auth/callback 5. Generate session secret: openssl rand -hex 32 6. Fill in the fields below and click Apply
Full guide: https://github.com/ozmoetr/testerfy#setup
Container.Requires: Tailscale Plugin, Spotify Premium, Spotify Developer App

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container port. Tailscale Serve handles external HTTPS on the same port.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Database and config storage. Back this up to preserve your history.

Config.Name: Spotify Client ID
Config.Description: From developer.spotify.com → Dashboard → Your App → Settings

Config.Name: Spotify Client Secret
Config.Description: From developer.spotify.com → Dashboard → Your App → Settings → View client secret

Config.Name: Spotify Redirect URI
Config.Description: https://YOUR-MACHINE.YOUR-TAILNET.ts.net:5247/api/auth/callback — must match your Spotify Developer Dashboard exactly

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Random security key. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
